reviews.text: Extremely good value for money. Rooms were spacious, clean and well designed. Check in took two minutes and staff were always on hand to help. Also loved that there was a bottle provided with the room and a water dispenser down the hall.

Fantastic service, particularly from Lisandra - we booked 10+ rooms and we had very attentive service in advance of and during our stay which made all the difference for our guests.
Also thank you to Ashley who assisted us with one of the accessible rooms and was very helpful.
The hotel is quiet and relaxed and we would definitely book again with our company.

A great hotel. Clean, spacious reception area. A very nice bar.
The hotel is set back off the main roads but a 2 minute walk to the Thames and then a 10 minute walk to Waterloo underground station, Big Ben, London eye and everything else around there.
There is a car park if you drive.
There are other underground stations near but the closest is 10 minutes walk.
The rooms are very nice, clean and a good size.
Price wise, it is a good price. I'd recommend getting breakfast as you have a great choice of food from continental to full English breakfast.

The hotel is nicely located adjacent to Lambeth Palace by the river, plenty to see and do nearby and some great pubs within fairly easy walking distance. Friendly and helpful staff, clean comfortable rooms (had a view overlooking the palace across the road and with Big Ben in the background) and, also has it's own car park which is a rarety in town. The room service breakfast is ginormous but, on the just warm side for the cooked element. Would be very happy to return if back in the area.
Property and quality of food is on. Good location for visiting London (close to bus and 10m to the tube). Would need more places to eat in the same street but few available in a 10m walk
